title.rendered: New Logo for The Iconic by Francesco de Chirico

content.rendered: “The Iconic is a Sydney-based Australian, online fashion retailer. The company was launched in 2011 under ecommerce incubator Rocket Internet, and is one of Australia’s largest online fashion retailer, managed by the Zalora Group. Fashion Retailer The Iconic sets 2013 Record with $28m Verlinvest Funding Deal]”, Ruehl, Mercedes, July 12, 2013 creating a growing home-based fashion community. Since its launch date, the brand has become an Australian online fashion retailer which stocks around 500 brands, including Australian labels by Johnny,sass & bide, and Camilla and Marc. International brands stocked include J Brand, Nike, Levi’s, G-Star RAW, and Adidas, with UK high street brands, River Island, Dorothy Perkins and New Look. THE ICONIC also has warehouses in both Sydney and Melbourne.” (Source: Wikipedia)
